name: WorldWide Telescope Tour Creator
author: Mark Sands & Jarod Luebbert

sections.description:
WWT Creator is a dynamic WorldWide Telescope tour creator that allows educators/bloggers/podcasters to create WWT tours on the fly. It’s feature rich and includes all you need to get an awesome tour up and running with custom objects and the ability to add your own music or narration. Show off the universe in your own way, visiting cool galactic destinations and adding a sweet soundtrack to the adventure.

This project is currently in v1.0.0beta so please let me know any and every bug by filing an issue. Grab your copy here and let me know what’s up!

This WWT Creator is made possible by the awesome folks at Galaxyzoo and Zooniverse. Visit the sister program here. And a huge thanks to Microsoft for helping with the API.
sections.installation:
1. Download plugin to the /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
